Jamal: Totally uninterrupted.

Jamal: You know, you don't have to answer.

Kevin: All right, tell me exactly what this stranger said -- I mean, exactly,

Lucy: Right, I opened the door, and he said he was lost. He said he wanted to

Kevin: You don't need to come into someone's house and get directions, right?
Lucy: Yeah, right.
Kevin: Unless you want something that's inside the house.

Kevin: Because there was something inside the house that he wanted.

Kevin: Ok, my friend, we know what you look like. Just what are you looking

Gabriela: Where are you? I need you.
Caleb: Gabriela.
Gabriela: Caleb. Finally. I knew you'd come.

Caleb: Jack Ramsey's growing stronger. Someone is helping him to feed. Tell

Alison: Did you see him again?

Livvie: No. But I felt him nearby, watching. And I had this dream. Caleb was

Alison: No, no. It's ok because nothing is making sense anymore. I mean,

Livvie: Before we buried Jack and he dug his way out and --

Alison: Well, then hold on to that feeling, Livvie. If you follow your heart,

Livvie: You really think that's all it's going to take?
Alison: Yeah, with all of my heart.
Jack: My love for Livvie is what gave me the strength to stand up to Caleb.

Jamal: You left here to try to take Livvie someplace that Caleb couldn't get

Jack: Oh, that was the plan. Turns out that church in the woods is our

Jamal: What?
Jack: Yeah.

Jamal: You mean to tell me we're mixed up with a vampire that lives in a

Jack: Jamal, the more blood I drink, the more I need. I already went through

Jack: I did what you said. I thought of Livvie -- how much I love her, how

Jamal: It made you stronger, right?
Jack: Yeah, yeah. I matched him move for move.
Jamal: And then you stopped him from killing you, obviously, right?

Jack: Well, I held him off for a while until Livvie came in, and it was like

Jamal: Yes! Yes!

Jack: Jamal, you were right. I don't have to turn into some bloodsucking worm

Caleb: This is your last chance, Gabriela.
Gabriela: It wasn't me. I don't know how he learned to feed.
Caleb: Liar.
Gabriela: No, I would never betray you.
Caleb: Liar!

Gabriela: I love you! I would never help Jack. I don't know how he learned to

Caleb: When?

Gabriela: At G.H., in the hallway. We talked. Remember, you were wearing that

Caleb: Idiot! That wasn't me. What, you think I'd be caught dead in broad

Gabriela: Your --

Caleb: We're twins. I just -- I wish I could drain every drop of his blood

Gabriela: Well, why can't you?

Caleb: You can't feed on your own blood, your own relatives. Which brings us

Gabriela: I don't know. I swear, I don't know.

Caleb: You don't understand. We want -- we want Jack to feel that rumble in

Gabriela: The blood bank.
Caleb: What?

Gabriela: There's blood missing from the supply at the hospital. I caught

Caleb: Good girl. Oh, you are such a good girl. I think you deserve a little

Gabriela: Surprise me. You know what I want.
Caleb: To be the one for all time.
Gabriela: To belong to you.

Gabriela: Caleb, I want to be the --

Caleb: Ah, ah, ah. No, no, no. Olivia will be my bride. I'll accept no other.

Caleb: Uh-uh. Business first. First we have to deal with Jack's little

Kevin: Come on, Lucy. There was something inside the house that he wanted.
Lucy: I know. I'm thinking, I'm thinking, I'm thinking.

Kevin: Well, what was it that gave you that vibe? Was it the way he spoke,

Lucy: Wait, wait. Shh. Just let me focus for a minute. I hear a knock. I get

Kevin: Lucy?

Kevin: But?

Lucy: Evil. I don't know, that's the only way I can describe them -- just

Kevin: Well, you're doing a pretty good job at it. And you're -- you're

Kevin: That's it.
Lucy: That's what? What?

Kevin: Lucy, there's only one other person that we know that might've seen

Kevin: Come on.
Lucy: Come on? What? Where?
Kevin: I'll tell you on the way. Just hurry.

Jack: Better now?

Jack: Hey, it's probably just a bug or something. It'll pass.
Livvie: I don't know. It feels like you have a fever.
Jack: Hey. Do you know how much I love you?
Livvie: The only thing in this world I am sure of is your love.

Jack: And do you know that the only thing I want to do is hold you close to
